biography:
Christine Joan Taylor (born July 30, 1971) is an American actress. She is known for playing Marcia Brady in The Brady Bunch Movie and A Very Brady Sequel, as well as roles in The Wedding Singer, Zoolander, and DodgeBall: A True Underdog Story.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Christine Taylor, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
name: Christine Taylor
